subject: Re: [junit] Failure Message
msgSnippet: Can you send the patch to me? :) I d like to include it into JUnitX
messageBody:
Can you send the patch to me? :)
I'd like to include it into JUnitX

Robert Sartin wrote:
>
> > This message (and possibly others are being truncated with an
> > elipsis...
> > Is there anyway to change the point of trunction or disable it
> > entirely?<BR>
>
> We just created a modified version of junit that doesn't do the
> truncation. I supposed a better solution would be to make it
> configurable (and submit the patch).
>
> Regards,
>
> Rob
